E.text: Light blow, but foe thinks it's your best.

D.text: You gain the initiative next round.

E.text: Things just failed to connect right.

A.text: Push foe with the punch. You receive initiative next round.

B.text: Deflected blow, but you gain the initiative next round.

C.text: You move quickly after blocking punch.You gain the initiative next round.

D.text: Use your body like a broom. Foe is unbalanced.

E.text: You block foe's forearm. You gain the initiative next round.

A.text: Foe steps aside unbalanced.You gain the initiative next round.

B.text: Your backhand is powerful. Strike foe across his face. You unbalance him.

C.text: Step into foe to knock him down. Bash to side unbalances foe.

D.text: Elbow to foe's side sends him reeling. Your follow-up swing misses.

E.text: Duck in close and hammer foe's side. You gain the initiative next round.

A.text: Good placement. You gain the initiative for the next two rounds.

B.text: Push foe back and kick his leg. You gain the initiative next round.

C.text: You try to sweep your foe off his feet.

D.text: You trip foe. He shuffles a full 15 feet before he gets his balance.

E.text: Cheap shot to foe's side bruises ribs. Foe crashes into the nearest obstacle.

A.text: Slight abrasion. You gain the initiative for the next two rounds.

B.text: Leg strike unsteadies foe. You stomp foe's feet for an extra advantage.

C.text: Boot to calf hits hard. You have the initiative next round.

D.text: You go in low and strike foe in his calf. He stumbles back with a nasty bruise.

E.text: Strike to the back of foe's leg gives you a back attack next round.

A.text: Glancing blow to foe's back. You gain the initiative for the next three rounds.

B.text: Foe lunges past you and you come down on his back. He realizes his pain.

C.text: You grab foe and bring your knee into foe's side. Strike lifts foe up and sends foe reeling.

D.text: Pull foe off balance and hammer him in the back with a solid fist.

E.text: You bash foe brutally. Your strike is solid.

A.text: Strike lands solid to the chest. Foe leaps back on the defensive.

B.text: You strike foe in his chest. Foe reels.

C.text: Classic grip to foe's collar garment. You punch him hard. He stumbles back 5 feet.

D.text: Chest strike causes deep bruise. Foe looks very surprised.

E.text: Chest wound knocks foe down. Your attack puts you in the place he was just standing.

A.text: Foe kicks out at you and you strike his leg in response.

B.text: You duck down and strike across at foe. Blow to thigh leaves a bad bruise.

C.text: Strike to foe's thigh. Your fist hits hard.

D.text: Bring your forearm down on foe's thigh, with most of your weight behind it. You have the initiative next round.

E.text: You do not know what a sweep or a throw is, but this surely seems like one. You slam foe to the ground.

A.text: Arm strike gives foe a bruised bicep. You are cruel.

B.text: You block foe's guard and punch him in the face. He just stands there.

C.text: Catch weapon arm and strike it across your own knee. Foe drops his weapon.

D.text: Strike to nerve in foe's upper arm causes him to drop whatever he is carrying.

E.text: Strong shoulder strike and a follow-up strike to the face.

A.text: Grapple foe's weapon arm and jerk his weapon free. Foe goes twisting and spinning out of your grasp.

B.text: Hammer foe in his kidneys. You know he is in pain. He grips his side and falls down. Finish him, the pain will not last.

C.text: Nasty strike to foe's mouth knocks out 2 teeth and reduces foe's Appearance, by 5, when he smiles.

D.text: Drive your finger into foe's eye, causing blindness. There is a 10% chance that this affliction is permanent.

E.text: Face strike is so hard foe's cheekbone is shattered. The shards mortally wound foe. He dies after 10 rounds of agony.

A.text: Blow to abdomen. Foe bends over and throws up.

B.text: Blow to foe's chest. You have mastered the common punch.

C.text: Strong blow to foe's forearm causes fracture.

D.text: Smash foe's hip. You have the initiative next round.

E.text: Throw foe into a solid object. He falls down.

A.text: Leg strike damages muscle and sends foe stumbling back.

B.text: Calf strike delivers a deep bruise. Foe looks down at the damage, forgetting about you.

C.text: A light punch unbalances foe. A kick to foe's leg knocks him down. He falls forward under you.

D.text: Leg strike causes foe to fall. You push him to hinder his landing and he sprains his ankle.

E.text: Snap palm into place against foe's knee. Tendon and cartilage damage. Foe has difficulty standing.

A.text: Blow to foe's shield arm. If foe has anything that resembles a shield, it is broken.

B.text: You snap foe's arm around like a noodle. His wrist is strained with the impact.

C.text: Grip foe's weapon arm and drive his fist against a hard surface. Hand is fractured. Foe is disarmed.

D.text: Strong blow to foe's weapon arm fractures his wrist. The pain makes his hand useless.

E.text: Fierce blow to foe's weapon arm breaks bone. Arm is useless. Use arm as leverage to flip foe onto his stomach.

A.text: Precision strike to foe's arm disarms him. Weapon hand is fractured. Foe is in pain.

B.text: Hand strike jams foe's fingers into their sockets. Ouch! Foe drops everything in his hands.

C.text: Strong blow to foe's arm fractures shoulder. You hit his shoulder one more time to make your point.

D.text: Grab foe's weapon arm and pull him over. Your kick to the ribs finally drops him to the ground.

E.text: Shoulder strike breaks foe's collar bone. Miscellaneous internal organ damage.

A.text: Two brutal punches to foe's face. This barrage leaves foe confused and swinging in the wrong direction.

B.text: Grab foe's weapon arm and beat on it without concern for the rest of foe. Foe is disarmed as ligaments are torn and muscles are pulled.

C.text: Accurate chest strike knocks wind out of foe. He falls over on you and you knock him off with an upper cut. He stand back up and stumbles 5 feet.

D.text: Blow to front of foe's neck. His head snaps back, but it does not break his neck. Foe cannot speak for 2-20 hours. He yells in silence.

E.text: Nasty blow ruptures stomach. Foe is knocked down. Internal bleeding is mortal. Foe will die in 20 rounds. He is still active.

A.text: Head strike breaks foe's nose. Appearance drops by 5 due to black eyes.

B.text: Land a solid shot to foe's head. Foe is definitely impressed. He steps toward you to keep from falling.

C.text: Precision strike to foe's head sends him to the ground. You can actually see the stars spinning around his head.

D.text: Strong blow to face cracks jawbone. Ow! Jaw is stuck open and foe appears permanently surprised about something.

E.text: Blow to foe's side. Bruise ribs, a kidney and a lung. Foe manages to remain standing. Oh that hurts ya know!

A.text: Blow to solar plexus causes foe to vomit. He falls to his knees. Foe is unable to do anything but retch. Do you have pity?

B.text: Groin strike is solid. You kick him again. Your strike leaves foe helpless. Really unkind.

C.text: Strike foe in his head. If he has a helm, you pull it off and hit him with it. He is knocked out for 4 hours. If foe has no helm, you knock him out for 5 rounds.

D.text: Strong blow to the abdomen causes internal bleeding and organ damage. Foe makes it a habit of spitting blood.

E.text: Grip foe's neck. You shake him violently, while attempting to choke him. He passes out. You can finish him if you want.

A.text: Elbow foe's face and then punch him hard. He is paralyzed from the neck down for 2 days. He falls instantly to the ground.

B.text: Strike to foe's head. If he has no helm, he is in a coma for 10-100 days. If foe has a helm it leaves a bruise on his head. Foe drops and is unconscious.

C.text: Mighty strike crashes into foe's head. If he has a helmet, he is unconscious for 1-10 days. If he has no helmet, skull collapses and brain is dead.

D.text: Grip foe's arm and pound on foe's head. One shot hits hard. Crushing strike to foe's temple. Foe dies instantly.

E.text: Your strike is frightening. Foe's head snaps to one side. Foe cannot breathe. He looks upon the world one last time and then dies. You are horrified at his doom.
